last_episode_to_air.name: The Legacy Continues
last_episode_to_air.overview: With only two days left before they must head back to Dutch Harbor for King Crab season, Josh and Casey have one last goal to achieve in Hawaii -- land a big marlin, the one fish that eluded Phil Harris decades ago.

name: Deadliest Catch: Bloodline
overview: Deadliest Catch captain Josh Harris goes on a journey to uncover a mystery left behind by his father, legendary Bering Sea crabber Phil Harris.
